description: This table contains the ESRD (End Stage Renal Disease) part of the Medicare Secondary Payor Information from the Patient (EPT) master file.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date (calendar format) on which the encounter took place.

columns.name: END_STAGE_RNL_YN
columns.description:
YES if the patient is entitled to Medicare because of End Stage Renal Disease


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: DIALYSIS_BGN_DATE
columns.description: Date when dialysis began.

columns.name: COORD_PERIOD_YN
columns.description:
YES if the patient is still in the coordination period.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: RECVG_TRNG_YN
columns.description:
YES if the patient is receiving training for self-dialysis.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: DIAL_TRN_BEGN_DATE
columns.description: Date when self-dialysis training began.

columns.name: MEDIC_INIT_ESRD_YN
columns.description:
YES if the patient's initial entitlement to Medicare was based on End Stage Renal Disease (ESRD).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PART_A_EFF_DATE
columns.description: Part A effective date.

columns.name: RNAL_TRANSPLT_YN
columns.description:
YES if the patient has had a kidney transplant because of End Stage Renal Disease (ESRD).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: RNAL_TRANSPLT_DATE
columns.description: Date of the transplant.

columns.name: BLACK_LUNG_YN
columns.description:
YES if the patient is entitled to benefits under the Black LungProgram.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: BLACK_LUNG_NUM
columns.description: Black Lung program ID number.

columns.name: BLCK_LUNG_COVD_YN
columns.description:
YES if the services being received are on the list of covered procedures for treatment of Black Lung.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: BLK_LUNG_BNFT_DATE
columns.description: Date the benefits for the Black Lung program began.

columns.name: PHS_YN
columns.description:
YES if the services are covered by a Public Health Service or Research Program.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PHS_START_DATE
columns.description: Start date of the Public Health Service (PHS) or research program.

columns.name: PHS_END_DATE
columns.description: End date of the Public Health Service (PHS) or research program.

columns.name: PHS_PROGRM_NAME
columns.description: Name of the Public Health Service (PHS) or research program.

columns.name: PHS_PROGRM_ADR_1
columns.description: Line 1 of Public Health Service (PHS) program address.

columns.name: PHS_PROGRM_ADR_2
columns.description: Line 2 of the Public Health Service (PHS) program address.

columns.name: PHS_PROGRM_CITY
columns.description: City of the Public Health Service (PHS) or research program.

columns.name: PHS_PROGRM_ZIP
columns.description: ZIP Code of the Public Health Service (PHS) or research program.

columns.name: IS_MSP_DIALYSIS_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient has received maintenance dialysis treatments.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MEDIC_INIT_ESRD_YN

columns.name: MSP_GHP_PRIOR_YN
columns.description:
MSP Item: tracks if the patient was receiving Group Health Plan (GHP) coverage prior to their coverage through Medicare. This has an influence on how the filing order is calculated after the MSPQ has been completed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No
